name: Ferret
description: Ferret Token is a product of inBierto CryptoCurrencies, a startup of education, development, and channeling of investors traditional to the crypto world, with offices in Uruguay and El Salvador. inBierto has a range of products under development and operations that is constantly growing. Its main product is in Bierto Earn App (inBierto.app), an earnings application where each user can fund their accounts or connect their accounts in exchange and generate profits through algorithmic trading with technology developed by the company.
